title: Clear night city driving with multiple braking events.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a busy city street at night, with multiple braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 4.2 m/s). There are 9 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is wet and there are many other vehicles on the street. The traffic lights are green and the pedestrians are walking on the sidewalk. The buildings are tall and there are many street lights illuminating the scene.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving cautiously because of the wet road and the presence of other vehicles and pedestrians. It slows down and brakes frequently to avoid potential accidents. The driver is paying close attention to the traffic lights and the surrounding environment to ensure safe navigation through the city.
